title: It takes forever to get into champ select and out of game
body:
Right now I have to use intent pick 1 or 2 bans in because the timer runs out and I get in after the first ban starts.

I also have low spec on but don't want to close the client when getting in game, since the game itself is ok even with the client, but the client is slow. After game I have to wait to get my results and by then everyone's left so I can't use the chat either.

Can we get 'close client on game start' as an option? rather than merging it with low spec?

replies.body: since the last patch every time i exit a game it takes FOREVER to load into the post game screen. i can even hear people typing in chat to each other while the stupid loading animation keeps spinning.  its annoying as fuck as sometimes i want to chat in post game yet everyone is usually gone by the time i load in.  this didnt happen before 7.4 so wtf.
I have the same problem, I then reinstalled it and nothing was better, still takes a lot of time to get out

this all started about the same time the champion selection issue was fixed.  Seems to me they just moved the issue from the start to the end lol.  I rather have it at the end then at the selection state, atleast 2 mins at the end doesnt effect your picking.

Ugh, i thought it was only me. The champ select takes forever to load. By the time i get in, i only have 30 seconds or so left. At the end of the game, it takes a while for it to load the stats and the post game screen. 

Please fix this, i don't want to scramble to pick the proper runes and masteries all the time

Ugh i have the same problem after game in the result i have to wait for like 2 mins uhh.. it makes me wanna delete lol..

Edit: Did you get rid of the slow loading? Are they even doing anything about this thing? They dont even think of us those who have slow crappy laptop.. -,-
Well make sure to disable that setting that closes the client on game start first, for me the lag is mostly gone
Me to I'm playing urf and by the time it takes to get into champ select I have 5 seconds to change masteries and runes...

I have the same issue :( 

This only just started happening for me a few days ago. I have a black screen till I get into a game 15 seconds late. Incredibly annoying!! Please fix <3
Please let there be a fix soon
For me a Full repair also didnt work. Hope it gets fixed soon. I have been marked as queue dodger multiple times today due to this.

Right now the new client is extremely slow for me. I might have a toaster or something, but I used the updated client before and it was tolerable. Now it is taking me easily 10-20 seconds from 1-5 seconds to get into champion select. After getting out of game, it takes foooorever to load back into the client.

I ran it on low spec mode, and it made no noticeable difference to me, but I think I'm paying attention to the wrong thing. What exactly does low spec mode do? I'd like to weight the benefits of having to wait longer to load back into the client after the game to what it is supposed to do.
Same here!!! Thank god im not the only one...
{{champion:498}}
so ...... how do we fix it D:
same i have the same problem but how the hell do we fix it ????
Best option is to just launch legacy client as loading Champ Select and post game stats is instant for me versus the minute it takes to load on the Beta Client{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I have the same prob... Never had it before tho... so annoying >.<
happened to me a long time ago when the new client was just out, however it was gone and now after patch 7.4 its happening to me again.
OMFG SAME ITS SO ANNOYINg

This has been happening to me as well. I thought it was just me because all of my friends seem to have no issue what so ever. I always have to ask what my champ is in discord, and can't view end game stats.
It's super annoying to only have a few seconds to switch masteries and sums around when needed :[

is this for URF because right now for me with the new client its a black screen and it glitch's so hard once it finely opened, just now it glitched so hard that it showed me the last champ select and i heard the champ i got from the last champ select, it takes like 10 seconds, even more when its a black screen, i really wanna play urf on the new client because of all the new stuff, the music and shit ;c
same dude.
